title: Feta and Bacon Stuffed Chicken with Onion Mash
ingredients: ['350g streaky bacon, cut into 2.5cm pieces', '150g crumbled feta cheese', '3 tablespoons soured cream', '1/8 tablespoon dried oregano', '1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper', '3 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '125g plain flour', '2 eggs, beaten', '100g dried breadcrumbs', '4 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '1 large onion, chopped', '30g butter', '3 tablespoons soured cream']
